summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1814, for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-fifth Street to West Eightieth Street; and West Seventy-fifth Street, from the west line of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest on the south to the east line of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest on the north, by grading, curbing and constructing cement sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 19006, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
